name: InviteMiroTeamMember
description:
Invite a new user to a Miro team within your organization.

Use this tool to invite an existing Miro organization member to an existing team. Suitable for Enterprise plan users with Company Admin roles. Ensure compliance with required authorization scopes and rate limiting.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Miro organization to which the user belongs.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the unique identifier of the team within the organization.

parameters.name: user_email_for_team_invitation
parameters.description: Email address of the user to be invited to the Miro team. Ensure the email belongs to a user in your Miro organization.

value_schema.description: User email to add to a team

parameters.name: team_member_role
parameters.description: Specify the role for the team member: 'member', 'admin', or 'team_guest'. Determines access and permissions in the team.

value_schema.description:
Role of the team member.
* "member":     Team member with full member permissions.
* "admin":      Admin of a team. Team member with permission to manage team.
* "team_guest": Team-guest user, user with access only to a team without access to organization.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: User email to add to a team

value_schema.description: User email to add to a team

parameters.name: role
parameters.description:
Role of the team member.
* "member":     Team member with full member permissions.
* "admin":      Admin of a team. Team member with permission to manage team.
* "team_guest": Team-guest user, user with access only to a team without access to organization.

value_schema.description:
Role of the team member.
* "member":     Team member with full member permissions.
* "admin":      Admin of a team. Team member with permission to manage team.
* "team_guest": Team-guest user, user with access only to a team without access to organization.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
